request.description:
Trigger a password reset email which will be sent to the email address provided in the request body (provided the user account exists).

The email will contain a One Time Passcode (OTP), which can be used to set a new password by calling the Reset User Password endpoint.
Set a new password for your user account by providing the One Time Passcode (OTP) obtained via the Send Password Reset Email endpoint, your registered email address and your new password.

query.description: Maximum number of matching results to return.
The number of matching results to skip before returning.
The start date and time in UTC of the analysis.
The end date and time in UTC of the analysis. If omitted this defaults to the current date and time in UTC.
Filter on specific zone or port events. When omitted, all events are returned. Options: ZONE_ENTRY, ZONE_EXIT, PORT_AREA_ARRIVAL, PORT_ARRIVAL, PORT_DEPARTURE, PORT_AREA_DEPARTURE. Comma-separated.
Three-letter ISO country codes to filter zones or ports by country. Comma-separated.
Filter on specific ports by UN/LOCODE. Comma-separated.
Filter positions to only include those which fall inside the specified zones and/or ports by ID. Use the Zone & Port Search API to find IDs. Comma-separated.
Filter by specific zone sub types. Refer to documentation for full list of sub types. Comma-separated.
Filter by specific zone types. Refer to documentation for full list of types. Comma-separated.
